metadata.name: Suspicious File Encoded To Base64 Via Certutil.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of certutil with the "encode" flag to encode a file to base64 where the extensions of the file is suspicious

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\certutil.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('certutil.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-encode')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/encode')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–encode')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—encode')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―encode'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.acl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.doc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.gif')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpeg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.mp3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.pdf')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.png')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ppt')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.tmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.xls')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.xml'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of certutil with the "encode" flag to encode a file to base64 where the extensions of the file is suspicious
